name: Car Driver 2
description:
This game is about:

the player have a mission to escape from a city with this car but if he crash to any thing the car will be destroyed.

 for movement.

       for breaking.

The assets:

  • The car is from unity asset store.
  • The obstacle cars from Sketchfab.
  • The army vehicles from Dev Assets.
  • The desert environment from Dev Assets.
  • The road from Kenny.
  • The city from Kitbash.
